name: BlogBowl
tagline: Keywordâ€‘driven AI articles autoâ€‘posted to your blog
description: Automate your blog with AI that writes research-backed SEO articles exactly like a human would â€“ with images, videos, stats, tables and citations. Optimized for Google and AI platforms like ChatGPT and Claude, they rank well and keep readers engaged. Built on an open-source core with SEO templates, analytics, and newsletter tools. Connect BlogBowl to your landing page, go live in 5 minutes and start getting clients from SEO content.

name: Sendr
tagline: Your complete GTM stack, powered by AI
description: Your complete AI-powered GTM stack. Start with a 500M+ contact database, enrich leads, create personalized lipsync videos and dynamic pages, then run sales automations and follow up lead engagement - all in one place. Built for GTM teams to connect smarter and scale faster in one consolidated platform.

name: Secure MCP Framework by Arcade.dev
tagline: Skip migration and launch MCP with built-in Auth
description: arcade-mcp is the MCP framework that grows with you. Launch a secure MCP server with built in Auth, zero setup, and no rewrites. Write clean Python, scale to production, and connect tools like Gmail or Slack in one line. Open source, eval ready, and works with LangGraph, Cursor, Claude, and more.

name: Layrr
tagline: Framer for your actual codebase
description: Layrr gives you Framer-style visual editing for your actual codebase. Drag and resize components, convert Figma to code, edit text in-browser, or design with AI, all while working with real files in your repo. Framework agnostic (React, Vue, Svelte, HTML). Deploy anywhere. 100% free and open-source.

name: Kimi K2 Thinking
tagline: The 1T Parameters Open-Source Thinking Model - SOTA on HLE
description: ðŸ”¹ SOTA on HLE (44.9%) and BrowseComp (60.2%) ðŸ”¹ Executes up to 200 â€“ 300 sequential tool calls without human interference ðŸ”¹ Excels in reasoning, agentic search, and coding ðŸ”¹ 256K context window

name: NocoBase 2.0
tagline: Model your data, then build apps with blocks and actions
description: Total control. Infinite extensibility. AI collaboration. Enable your team to adapt quickly and cut costs dramatically. No years of development. No millions wasted. Deploy NocoBase in minutes â€” and take control of everything.

name: Fusion 1.0
tagline: The first AI agent for product, design, and code
description: Fusion is the first AI agent that unifies product, design, and code. It connects Slack, Jira, Figma, and your repo to turn ideas into production features. Edit visually with real code, sync designs bidirectionally, and let the bot handle PRs, fixes, and feedback. With AI memory, design system intelligence, and granular permissions, Fusion learns how your team builds and accelerates delivery across every stage of your workflow.

name: MyClone
tagline: AI Clone that scales your expertise
description: An AI platform built for knowledge professionals to help scale their services. Check out the live demo in https://www.myclone.is/ The clone acts as an extension of you, continuously learning from your YouTube, podcasts, documents, videos, and audio. It speaks in your voice, language, and gets integrated into your current workflow (website, Slack, etc.) Oh, you can complete white label it. Think of MyClone as "Shopify for knowledge professionals".

name: Burner Terminal
tagline: Tap to Pay for Stablecoins
description: Weâ€™re thrilled to announce Burner Terminal, the first point of sale built for native tap to pay stablecoin payments. There is no need for QR codes or opening apps; simply tap Burner to Terminal to immediately pay in USDC on Base. Designed for small businesses everywhere, it makes accepting stablecoins simple, secure, and free from chargebacks and high fees -- and it still accepts traditional credit cards too.

name: Sourmize
tagline: Automatic UTMs with AI + Intelligent Analytics
description: Transform clicks into insights. AI generates perfect UTMs, personalized shortlinks and analytics that tell the complete story of your traffic. Decide with data, not assumptions.

name: Groodles
tagline: Art therapy app with Apple Health that unlocks a better you
description: We have been working hard to deliver better health outcomes for our users. A major part of that has involved doubling down on features that allow users to track their time spent on the app and provide more content based on their moods. That's exactly what we have achieved with our Apple Health integration. Your time spent on the exercises within the app gets tracked as Mindful Minutes on Apple Health. The app now also provides a world of content based on your moods (almost 25+ of them).

name: Wagoo Voice Assistant
tagline: Never lift a finger again. Voice AI for email & calendar
description: Current voice assistants can't do anything useful. We built Wagoo because we were tired of voice assistants that search the web. Wagoo is a voice-first AI executive assistant that actually executes tasks. Speak naturally to send emails, schedule meetings, and manage your calendarâ€”all hands-free. Inbox Zero and a fully managed calendar. Works across desktop and mobile, at the desk or on the road. No more typing. No more app-switching. Just speak, and it's done.

name: Pixley AI
tagline: Pixley lets kids turn their ideas into cartoons in minutes
description: Pixley is the first platform that lets children turn their drawings and ideas into personalized, animated cartoons in minutes. Until now, making animation was slow, expensive, and impossible to personalize â€“ but we are the first to unlock long-form video generation with consistent characters and storylines. And the timing could not be better: kidsâ€™ content today is overstimulating and empty, while AI video is improving in quality and dropping in cost every month.

name: LiveAvatar by HeyGen
tagline: Realtime lifelike interactive avatars for conversational AI
description: LiveAvatar brings AI to life through real-time, face-to-face video communication. Hyper-realistic avatars that see, hear, and respond with natural expression, lip sync, and body language. Built for developers and businesses, these digital agents join you 24/7, scale instantly, speak any language, and transform support, training, and live experiences into human-like conversations.

name: American Ratings Lead Magnet Portal
tagline: Get Your Verified A-I-R-S Number & Boost Global Credibility
description: Build verified business credibility with the American Ratings Lead Magnet Portal â€” the trusted platform for authentic verification and global rating credentials. Get your A-I-R-S Number to showcase trust, compliance, and excellence. Empower your brand with transparent validation, recognized ratings, and global visibility that help businesses, startups, and professionals gain credibility and stand out worldwide.

name: Jina Debug
tagline: AI on call engineer that resolves production issues
description: Jina uses your logs and codebase to automatically investigate and resolve your alerts, bugs, and incidents.

name: Credora by RedStone
tagline: Risk-Aware DeFi, Finally
description: DeFi participants have been making yield decisions in the dark. You see an attractive APY and have to ask yourself: Is this sustainable? What could go wrong? Before Credora, the answer was "good luck figuring it out." Credora by RedStone transforms complex risk data into simple, actionable ratings - similar to how credit ratings guide traditional finance decisions. Every strategy can now get a credible risk score, powered by a comprehensive methodology and industry-leading experts.

name: Bricks AI Dashboards
tagline: Data to Dashboards, Insights, & Reports in Seconds
description: We set out to do for Power BI and Tableau what Canva did for Photoshop. Bricks lets anyone turn data into beautiful, interactive dashboards and reports in seconds...powerful, simple, and actually fun to use.

name: aihumaniser.pro
tagline: Humanise AI Text Instantly with a Free AI Text Humaniser
description: AI Humaniser is the fastest way to humanise AI text and turn rough notes into polished, natural-sounding scripts. Designed for creators, teams, and professionals, this AI text humaniser adds clarity, warmth, and personality to your content in seconds. Whether you're looking to humanise AI generated text or refine messy drafts, our tool helps you save 3+ hours per script. Transform robotic AI writing into authentic, engaging content with ease and make every word sound genuinely human.

name: Befoundr
tagline: Validate your startup idea in 10 minutes
description: Befoundr is the interactive AI canvas that validates startup ideas in real-time through conversation Living Canvas: Organize thoughts visually while AI validates in background. Update one insight, entire strategy auto-adjusts. Real-Time Scoring: Watch validation score climb from 1.5â†’7.8 as you add context. Natural conversation with AI. No dropdowns or mandatory fields. Built for Builders: Developer-founders can validate fast without spreadsheets or business jargon.
